2015-02-09 04:01:21--:DemonSkye!~DemonSkye@pool-108-20-26-37.bstnma.fios.verizon.net PRIVMSG #BeginnersProgramming :Therefore for every push (add) you are removing 2 items

2015-02-17 12:41:00--:Winestone!~Winestone@c122-106-164-128.carlnfd1.nsw.optusnet.com.au PRIVMSG #BeginnersProgramming :NeedHelp, then we hack to make sure back points to the place we want the next element to go which is "back = (back + 1) % 10;" (correctly demonstrated by your code)
